metadata.title: CVE-2020-8285 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
curl 7.21.0 to and including 7.73.0 is vulnerable to uncontrolled recursiondue to a stack overflow issue in FTP wildcard match parsing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8285` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.18
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.18
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.18
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.18
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.18').
